# Waves of Exhaustion (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 60 ft.

**Area:** Cone-shaped burst

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 368

Waves of negative energy cause all living creatures in the spellâ€™s area to become [[Exhausted|exhausted]]. This spell has no effect on a creature that is already [[Exhausted|exhausted]].
